sentences.sContent: What a real growth is need courage and faith to try new thing and abnegate old things.
sentences.sContent_eng: What a real growth is need courage and faith to try new thing and abnegate old things.
sentences.sCn: 真正的成长是要有勇气和信心去尝试新的事物，同时放弃旧有的事物。

remMethod.val: ab(脱离) + neg(否认) + ate → 否认， 放弃

trans.tranOther: to deny to oneself; renounce (privileges, pleasure, etc)
